sentence.Network_en: Torn muscles retract, and lose strength, structure, and tightness.
sentence.Network_cn: 撕裂的肌肉会收缩，丧失原来的力量、结构和紧实度。

sentence.Network_en: He's hoping that if he makes me feel guilty, I'll retract.
sentence.Network_cn: 他指望着如果他能让我感到内疚，我就会收回所说的话。

sentence.Network_en: A cat can retract its claws, but a dog can't.
sentence.Network_cn: 猫的爪子可以缩进去, 但狗不能.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin retract- 'drawn back', from the verb retrahere (from re- 'back' + trahere 'drag'); the senses 'withdraw (a statement') and 'go back on' via Old French from retractare 'reconsider' (based on trahere 'drag')

entry.tran: 收回，撤回(所说的话或写的东西)
entry.def: If you retract something that you have said or written, you say that you did not mean it.

example.ex: Mr Smith hurriedly sought to retract the statement, but it had just been broadcast on national radio...
example.tran: 史密斯先生想赶快收回这项声明，但它刚刚已经在国家电台播出了。

example.ex: He's hoping that if he makes me feel guilty, I'll retract.
example.tran: 他指望着如果他能让我感到内疚，我就会收回所说的话。

entry.def: When a part of a machine or a part of a person's body retracts or is retracted, it moves inwards or becomes shorter.

example.ex: Torn muscles retract, and lose strength, structure, and tightness.
example.tran: 撕裂的肌肉会收缩，丧失原来的力量、结构和紧实度。
当飞机的轮子收起来的时候

means.word_mean: 1. formally reject or disavow a formerly held belief, usually under pressure;

sentences.sentence: "He retracted his earlier statements about his religion"

means.word_mean: 2. pull away from a source of disgust or fear
3. use a surgical instrument to hold open (the edges of a wound or an organ)
4. pull inward or towards a center;

sentences.sentence: "The pilot drew in the landing gear"

auth_sentence.content: He has called on Netanyahu to retract it.
auth_sentence.res_content: He has called on Netanyahu to retract it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He has called on Netanyahu to retract it.

auth_sentence.content: In contrast, dogs don't retract their testicles during ejaculation.
auth_sentence.res_content: In contrast, dogs don't retract their testicles during ejaculation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In contrast, dogs don't retract their testicles during ejaculation.

auth_sentence.content: I must retract some of the things I have said against them.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: I must retract some of the things I have said against them.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"回,向后,相反,不"; 2. 表示"一再,重新"

re回,向后,相反,不+son声音+ant……的→声音回过来→回响的
re反+vers转+e→反转的
re一再,重新+splend光辉+ent……的→再光辉→辉煌的
re回,向后,相反,不+neg否认+ade个人或集体→反过来否认原的[党]→背叛者
re回,向后,相反,不+peal驱动→反驱动→取消;参考:appeal呼吁
re不+prob正直+ate人→不正直→败坏
re向后+st站→立于后面者→其他的[人,物]
re一再,重新+cidiv掉下+ism行为,现象→再次掉入罪行
re一再,重新+pose放→再放下[工作]→休息
re一再,重新+surg升起,浪潮+ence表名词→重起浪潮→复兴
re回,向后,相反,不+proach接近→不接近→指责
re反+volt转→反过转→反叛
re回+call喊;想→回想
re回+flect弯曲→弯曲返回→反射
re回,向后,相反,不+linqu离开+ish表动词→离开不再要→放弃
re回,向后,相反,不+mov运动,移动+e→移开,消除
re回,向后,相反,不+pel推→击退
re反+sent感觉→反感→不满
re反+sist站→反着站→反抗
re回+tract拉→拉回,缩回
re回+treat→v.后退,撤退
re一再,重新+arrange安排→v.重新安排
re一再,重新+assure确保→v.消除某人疑虑
re一再,重新+capit头+ulate=ate表动词→重新把头拿出来→概括要点
re一再,重新+claim喊→喊回来→取回,引申为开垦荒地
re一再,重新+commend赞扬→一再赞扬
re一再,重新+furbish装饰→再装饰→刷新

re一再,重新+iterate重说→反复重说

stems_affixes.value_cn: 描述,表示,象征;代表;阐明
